alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead and Western Madison below 6000ft; Northwest Beaverhead County; Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 5:05PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A line of thunderstorms will impact portions of western Beaverhead County through 545 PM MDT... At 504 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking showers and a few strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near North Fork to near Leadore to 17 miles south of Gilmore, all in Idaho. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wisdom, Jackson, Dell, Grant, Bannack Pass, Polaris, Bannack, Clark Canyon, and Bannack State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for southwestern Montana.

area.areaDesc: Beaverhead and Western Madison below 6000ft; Northwest Beaverhead County; Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains
